actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Treasury.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to amend the Budget and Accounting Act, 1921, and the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the inclusion of certain figures on capital and operational expenditures in the budgets transmitted to the Congress by the President and in the first concurrent resolutions on the budget.

summary.text: Budget Amendments Act of 1981 - Amends the Budget and Accounting Act of 1921 to require the President to differentiate capital expenditures from operational expenditures in the annual budget submitted to the Congress. Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the first concurrent resolution on the budget in each fiscal year to include figures on capital and operational expenses in its estimate of budget outlays.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Budget and Accounting Act, 1921, and the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the inclusion of certain figures on capital and operational expenditures in the budgets transmitted to the Congress by the President and in the first concurrent resolutions on the budget.
